Sweet Memories

First Glance

Time stood still that blessed day,
When your eyes met mine in May.
The world around us ceased to be,
Just you, my love, just you and me.

Rainy Evening

Remember Ishu, that rainy night,
When we danced in pure delight.
Droplets sparkling in your hair,
Love's magic in the evening air.

First Date

Coffee steam and nervous smiles,
Ishu's laugh that stretched for miles.
Time flew by on golden wings,
As my heart with joy still sings.

Beach Sunset

Waves kissing shores of golden sand,
Ishu walking, hand in hand.
Sun painting skies in love's own hue,
Perfect moment, just us two.

Starlit Night

Under stars that brightly shine,
Ishu's fingers wrapped in mine.
Whispered dreams and gentle sighs,
Love reflected in night skies.

Morning Text

Simple words upon my screen,
"Good morning, love" from my queen.
Ishu's message starts my day,
Chasing all my blues away.

First Snow

Snowflakes dancing in the air,
Ishu's wonder, pure and rare.
Catching crystals on your tongue,
Joy that keeps my heart so young.

Movie Night

Cuddled close on cozy couch,
Ishu's head upon my shoulder pouch.
Film forgotten in the night,
Lost in love that feels so right.

Birthday Surprise

Candles glowing on your cake,
Ishu's smile, my heart did take.
Wishes whispered soft and true,
Celebrating precious you.

Park Picnic

Checkered blanket on green grass,
Watching clouds and time that pass.
Ishu sharing bread and wine,
Simple moments so divine.
